mapper.select: select scooter.id, scooter.group_id, scooter.color_id, scooter.combin_qty, scooter.able_in_wh_qty, scooter.in_wh_qty, group1.group_name AS groupName, color.color_value AS colorValue, color.color_name AS colorName, scooter.rsn as sn, scooter.tablet_sn, scooter.bbi, scooter.controller, scooter.motor, scooter.imei, scooter.bluetooth_mac_address from ope_in_whouse_scooter_b scooter left join ope_specificat_group group1 on scooter.group_id = group1.id left join ope_color color ON color.id = scooter.color_id where scooter.dr = 0 and scooter.in_wh_id = #{inWhId}
